user.title: Govee API Key
user.description: Enter your Govee API key from {api_url}

account.title: Govee Account (Optional)
account.description: Enter Govee account credentials for real-time MQTT updates. Leave empty to skip.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Govee
reauth_confirm.description: Your API key is invalid. Please enter a new one.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Govee
reconfigure.description: Update your Govee credentials. Current email: {current_email}

data_description.email: Govee account email for real-time MQTT updates
data_description.password: Leave empty to keep existing password, or enter new password

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Govee API

refresh_scenes.name: Refresh Scenes
refresh_scenes.description: Refresh available scenes from the Govee API

set_segment_color.name: Set Segment Color
set_segment_color.description: Set color for specific segments on RGBIC devices

device_id.name: Device ID
device_id.description: Device ID of the RGBIC light

auth_failed.title: Govee authentication failed
auth_failed.description: The API key for {entry_title} is no longer valid. The integration cannot communicate with Govee until you re-authenticate.

rate_limited.title: Govee API rate limited
rate_limited.description: The Govee API has rate limited requests for {entry_title}. Normal operation will resume in approximately {reset_time}. Consider increasing the poll interval in the integration options to reduce API calls.

mqtt_disconnected.title: Govee MQTT disconnected
mqtt_disconnected.description: Real-time updates for {entry_title} are unavailable. Reason: {reason}. The integration will continue to work using polling. Check your Govee account credentials if this persists.
